Reviews.Title: Classy little Jobbie
Reviews.Author: J. Buechler
Reviews.Content: I've used this phone about four years. Couldn't find it (crisis) and so recently bought another on Amazon.  Took way less time to get to me than they said it would.Decidedly low tech and still worthy of my attention.

Reviews.Title: Unlocked Nokia 6103b T-Moble GSB cell phone black and silver
Reviews.Author: sandy
Reviews.Content: I had order this phone for my grandson for christmas,but it did not work its been like 3 month when i order it.so i did not think they would do anything for me so i contact the seller, the company was great they sent me a other phone,with no question ask,very good customer care.now the phone works and its really nice and easy to ues,i will order from them again.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Atts624
Reviews.Content: My dad got this phone in 2006, it died this summer. He used it every single day, dropped it in the pool twice, and finally the killing blow was dropping it 2 stories to tar. Never once did he have to restart it because it wasn't working or such. this is an awesome phone. you would love it.

ProductInfo.Features:
Band:GSM 850/1800/1900
Connection: IrDA,DKU-5,Bluetooth

This is Unlocked for Any GSM Carrier Worldwide. Just insert your Sim card and ready to use
